string.value: An empty piece of fortune paper. Take it over to Cassandra and ask her to decipher the note.

string.name: desc
string.value: A seal from Ryden. It must be delivered to Shiba.

string.name: desc
string.value: A legendary item that can supposedly grant you the power of insight. Take it over to Lady Syl.

string.name: desc
string.value: A diary that was left by Lady Syl's father, also known as the Former Dark Lord. It contains his life stories, but it is hard to decipher because it is written in codes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A calabash in which the King Sage Cat is sealed. It must be delivered to Arec in El Nath.

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter to Lady Syl from Arec. It's better to not open the letter because of its confidentiality.

string.name: desc
string.value: A map piece which a place in Perion has been marked. Collect 20 pieces to see the complete map.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A document that is known to contain top secret information about Maple World. Cassandra seems interested in this report.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of a Baby Onyx Dragon's horn.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cell phone that belongs to a young lady who came to visit the Golden Temple.

string.name: desc
string.value: Camera that belongs to a young lady who came to visit the Golden Temple.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lime that belongs to Toniza who sells fruits in the Golden Temple.

string.name: desc
string.value: A solid-looking dragon egg that apparently holds legendary treasures, according to the Shadow Knight Rene. It can only be opened using the Twin Dragon's Egg Incubator.

string.name: desc
string.value: Warning: Telling lies while consuming this lollipop will induce severe sneezing.\nRecommendation: No more than 10 per day. Excessive consumption may result in cavities.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blue chocolate chip cookie mainly used in pranks. Cookie consumption will result not only in blue lips, but also in a blue face. It can be obtained from blue or purple monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: Page 5 of a diary written by Shammos in the past.

string.name: desc
string.value: A weapon used by Ferocious Hoblins.

string.name: name
string.value: Empty Bottle for Ancient Glacial Water

string.name: desc
string.value: An empty bottle that can be used to collect Ancient Glacial Water from the Ice Cliff.

string.name: desc
string.value: A heat bag passed down by thieves that can help keep you warm in the extreme cold of the Ice Ravine.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coal dust that can be used to make the Heat Bag.

string.name: desc
string.value: A well-organized report on the Environmental Sample.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sample obtained from a monster for environmental research. Obtain 5 to get results.

string.name: desc
string.value: A 7 of Spades. Fits neatly up your sleeve.

string.name: desc
string.value: A 7 of Diamonds. Perfect for magic tricks.

string.name: desc
string.value: A 7 of Hearts. One-fourth of a four-of-a-kind.

string.name: desc
string.value: A 7 of Clubs. Is this your card?

string.name: desc
string.value: A non-consumable piece of anniversary cake dropped by all mobs and anniversary cake mobs. These items will continually drop throughout the event. Since after 3 hours the town returns to a neutral state, this allows players to strategize their attacks. Town Cake Piece turn in total will be at zero at event start and will also return to zero 3 hours after an invasion, when the town returns to neutral state.

string.name: desc
string.value: A non-consumable piece of anniversary pie dropped by all mobs and anniversary pie mobs. These items will continually drop throughout the event. Since after 3 hours the town returns to a neutral state, this allows players to strategize their attacks. Town Pie Piece turn in total will be at zero at event start and will also return to zero 3 hours after an invasion, when the town returns to neutral state.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magic pill that was created by Nix the Wise of Minar Forest. It looks strangely modern, and it supposedly has the power to change your looks to their ideal state.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blue scale of Blueon, the captain of Blue Dragon Turtles. It symbolizes harmony and friendship amongst Blue Dragon Turtles.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red scale of Redring, the captain of Red Dragon Turtles. It symbolizes harmony and friendship amongst Red Dragon Turtles.

string.name: desc
string.value: An unofficial history book of Magatia that was purchased from Han the Broker. It is a forbidden book that contains the hidden history of Magatia.

string.name: desc
string.value: A note containing ambiguous scribbles. It seems to be a diagram with an explanation of a pentacle, but only an alchemist would be able to fully understand it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fake Sand Bandit emblem that Jano prepared. Most people would surely fall for it.

string.name: desc
string.value: An extremely old root from an aged bellflower named Guon near Herb Town. It appears to have effects just as miraculous as those of ginseng.

string.name: desc
string.value: A new medicine that Mr. Do invented. People are not certain whether it is poisonous. Do NOT consume even when offered.

string.name: desc
string.value: A document Chumji ripped up and threw away. You might be able to read what it says if you collect all the pieces and put them together.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sturdy claw made out of Hodori's leather. It cannot be equipped.

string.name: desc
string.value: The uniform Hogul was wearing. It cannot be equipped.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute bow Agent M lost. Could Agent M have tried to wear it himself?

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter Korin wrote to Agent M. Being the stereotypical girl, Korin wrote on pink stationery.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gloves that Sarah made. Judging from the white laces, the gloves appear to be made for weddings.

string.name: desc
string.value: A toy modeled after Master Robo. Kids would love it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gloves that Sarah made for Nana. They seem quite valuable.

string.name: desc
string.value: A present to Korin from Agent M.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: An ID card so faded that it is hard to identify to whom it belongs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bone Fish's bone that does not have any general value. However, an alchemist would be thrilled to see it.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: An egg of Titiana, the Mount for knights. Share your experiences with Titiana to make it grow. Once it matures into a full-grown creature, hand it in to Kiridu the Mount Trainer.

string.name: desc
string.value: A glass incubator where Titiana is placed. Drag the food into the incubator to feed Titiana. Once it matures, bring it back to Kiridu the Mount Trainer.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mind of Maple Necklace that brings luck to anyone who wears it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Drawing paper on which you can draw a portrait of an Orange Mushroom. The portrait of an Orange Mushroom can be completed by using the Amazing, Mystical, or Magical watercolor paint on it. \r\n#cCan be opened by double-clicking on it with the mouse.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drawing paper on which you can draw a portrait of an Octopus. The portrait of an Octupus can be completed by using the Amazing, Mystical, or Magical watercolor paint on it. \r\n#cCan be opened by double-clicking on it with the mouse.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drawing paper on which you can draw a portrait of a Yeti. The portrait of a Yeti can be completed by using the Amazing, Mystical, or Magical watercolor paint on it. \r\n#cCan be opened by double-clicking on it with the mouse.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Hanging Scroll given to you by the Black Wing Shadow Warrior. The erased content can be restored by using special ink.\r\n#cCan be opened by double-clicking on it with a mouse.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A treasure map given by Kyrin. There are three sections--red, green, and white--that are invisible. The green section should be cleaned first. \r\n\r\n*If you don't need the item anymore, just go to Jack in the Top Floor - Hallway to discard it.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A thermometer that displays a person's heart. \r\n#cDouble-click to check the temperature.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The 7th Anniversary Jigsaw Puzzle. Complete it the puzzle to see a picture of a birthday party.

string.name: desc

string.value: A mechanical heart from an android. Energy must be charged with EXP, just like the Energy Cartridge.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gold treasure chest dropped by a monster. This can be opened with the Master Key available at the Cash Shop. If you already have the Master Key, just double-click the box to open it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A silver treasure chest dropped by a monster. This can be opened with the Master Key available at the Cash Shop. If you already have the Master Key, just double-click the box to open it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gold treasure chest dropped by a monster. This can be opened with the Premium Gold Master Key available at the Cash Shop. If you already have the Premium Gold Master Key, just double-click the box to open it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A silver treasure chest dropped by a monster. This can be opened with the Premium Silver Master Key available at the Cash Shop. If you already have the Premium Silver Master Key, just double-click the box to open it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Golden Chicken Effect was given as a reward for helping Lazy Daisy. You can turn it ON/OFF by double-clicking the icon or using the key configuration menu to assign a shortcut key.

string.name: desc
string.value: This effect is for people who helped Lazy Daisy but failed to hatch the egg. You can turn it ON/OFF by double-clicking the icon or using the key configuration menu to assign a shortcut key.

string.name: desc
string.value: A beautiful card with season's greetings.

string.name: desc
string.value: A beautiful card with season's greetings. Double click on it to read!

string.name: desc
string.value: A note that Boru is desperately looking for in order to obtain the Perfect Pitch. Visit Boru at Henesys or at the entrance of Free Market by 31st of October to trade in the note for a rare item.

string.name: desc
string.value: A guitar pick made of gold that can be traded for an item when Inkwell returns from his performance.

string.name: desc
string.value: A one of a kind, untradeable item received by a player for taking over a town during a Cake or Pie invasion or from #cNPC Pie Lord Tiara or Cake Boss Daniel# after participating in a Cake or Pie invasion.

string.name: desc
string.value: A medal issued by the OSSS. It can be used to purchase various core cells from Senior Researcher Zen.

string.name: desc
string.value: An icy blue pick used for playing the guitar. You can take it to Inkwell to purchase a special item.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be used to purchase items from Fur Puff near White Christmas Hill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be used to purchase rare items from Fur White near White Christmas Hill.

string.name: desc
string.value: A meter that can measure damage.

string.name: desc
string.value: Reward medal give from English School

string.name: desc
string.value: A shoulder piece from the Grey Vulture.

string.name: desc
string.value: A brick that was once part of the Castle Golem's body.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small totem engraved with a picture of a lion, with the power to purify the Lion King's power. To purify the corruption of the medal, many are needed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red orb that was on Riche's staff. It's emitting a cold aura.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cape that a Golden Rabbit left behind.

string.name: desc
string.value: A spear used by Ferrets. It looks perfect for training purposes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A shield used by Golden Ferrets. It looks perfect for training purposes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A shabby helmet worn by Scorpies.

string.name: desc
string.value: A shiny helmet worn by Golden Scorpies.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Mammoth's tail that the Chryse villagers collect for its health value.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Golden Mammoth's very hard tusk.

string.name: desc
string.value: A key that opens that locked chest inside the Halloween Mansion. Drop the key front of the chest to open it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Syrup made from the sweet-and-sour red mango. It's clear and shines brightly with red.

string.name: desc
string.value: Extract from a yellow gardenia fruit. It's perfect for food coloring.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sheet music to the legendary piece, Moonlight Sonata. Due to its rarity, it's traded at a high price among hard-core collectors.

string.name: desc
string.value: A metal cylinder used to make a music box.

string.name: desc
string.value: A music box that plays Moonlight Sonata when wound up. It was specially created by Gold Richie.

string.name: desc
string.value: Jenn's brother who was trapped in the Lion King's Castle. Better bring him to Jenn.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A key that can open the Roof of the Second Tower at the Lion King's Castle.

string.name: desc
string.value: A key that can open the Roof of the Third Tower at the Lion King's Castle.

string.name: name
string.value: Dirty Magic Scroll of the Knight

string.value: A magic scroll that the Lion King gave to his knights. It's dirty and doesn't work anymore.

string.value: A key to the Rose Garden that the Lion King made for his queen, Ifia.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A pendant with a picture of Lion King's Queen Ifia.

string.name: desc
string.value: 올해 수확한 찹쌀을 곱게 빻아서 만든 찹쌀가루다. 끈기가 좋아서 떡을 만들 때 사용하기 좋다.

string.name: desc
string.value: 유기농법으로 재배한 찹쌀을 곱게 빻아서 만든 찹쌀가루다. 끈기가 좋아서 떡을 만들 때 사용하기 좋다.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stone that contains the power of Virtue. When you have the stone in possession, a gauge will fill each time you hit a monster. When the gauge is full, you can use the basic attack key to use Virtue's Blessing, which lasts for 1 hour and can be stacked with other buffs.\r\n#cWhile Virtue's Blessing is in effect, the gauge will no longer fill up. The strength of the blessing will also increase when you reach Level 31 and Level 71.#

Those coins can only be used during the 7th Anniversary and you can trade them for a JoyBird's Feather scroll by Mr. Inkwell, to upgrade your Maple Beryl armour and your Maple Beryl equipment into a Maple Crimson equipment.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cCrafting Grand Opening#\nA special gift from Cole for level 1-2 miners. Lets you enter the secret mine through the portal in the lower level of #cArdentmill#. The mine has a #c10 minute time limit#.\nYou can enter 3 times a day.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cCrafting Grand Opening#\nA special gift from Cole for level 3-4 miners. Lets you enter the secret mine through the portal in the lower level of #cArdentmill#. The mine has a #c10 minute time limit#.\nYou can enter 3 times a day.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cCrafting Grand Opening#\nA special gift from Saffron for level 1-2 herbalists. Lets you enter the secret herb patch through the portal in the lower level of #cArdentmill#. The herb patch has a #c10 minute time limit#.\nYou can enter 3 times a day.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cCrafting Grand Opening#\nA special gift from Saffron for level 3-4 herbalists. Lets you enter the secret herb patch through the portal in the lower level of #cArdentmill#. The herb patch has a #c10 minute time limit#.\nYou can enter 3 times a day.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cCrafting Renewal Discount#\nA special gift from Cole for level 5-6 miners. Lets you enter the secret mine through the portal in the lower level of #cArdentmill#. The mine has a #c10 minute time limit#.\nYou can enter three times a day.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cCrafting Renewal Discount#\nA special gift from Saffron for level 5-6 herbalists. Lets you enter the secret herb patch through the portal in the lower level of #cArdentmill#. The herb patch has a #c10 minute time limit#.\nYou can enter three times a day.

string.value: You can purchase from a grocery store in town or get from monsters. Placing the notes on the #cMagic Harp#, you can check out the mysterious items with magic power.
